name: Disco Musk
description:
DISCO MUSK has been made for the SpaceJam in less than a week by Theoprior and Avace. 
Share your best scores with us in the comments!

2021, October 1st.

Elon Musk has invaded
Mars with Space X.

You are the last hope
for all Martians.

You must defeat
Elon's Tesla shooting cannons and
collect as much money on the way.

Don't forget, us Martians like to dance,
making jumps and firing your laser in time
to the beat will give us the best shot in saving Mars.

Credits:

  • Theoprior - Music and sound effects
  • Avace - Code

Fonts are free fonts from dafont.com, some visual assets have been taken from craftpix.net.
